# ram testbench data file
# addr cs rd oe write_data read_data
#
# skip
00 0 0 0 00000000 00000000
# mem[0] <= 00010203
00 1 0 0 00010203 00000000
# nop
00 1 1 0 00000000 00000000
# mem[0] == 00010203
00 1 1 1 00000000 00010203
# nop
00 1 1 0 ffffffff 00000000
# mem[1] <= 04050607
01 1 0 0 04050607 00000000
# mem[0] == 00010203
00 1 1 1 00000000 00010203
# mem[1] == 04050607
01 1 1 1 00000000 04050607
